imdb.plot outline: Sometimes, the only path to the throne passes through a pool of blood. From the dawn of time, Ancient India has always struggled with its rulers and usurpers. The history that we read today has been written in red ink and spells treachery, deceit and betrayal. The glory of kings was tainted by the heinous crimes; all of them leading into murder. These events, still rustling in the history, are about to be opened. Set as a chronicle of the historical crimes, Rakkt narrates and analyses the most infamous true stories of historical assassinations, which changed the course of modern India. The bone chilling tales of deceit and betrayal are brought to light from the exotic ruins of the real locations.
imdb.title: Rakkt
plot: Sometimes, the only path to the throne passes through a pool of blood. From the dawn of time, Ancient India has always struggled with its rulers and usurpers. The history that we read today has been written in red ink and spells treachery, deceit and betrayal. The glory of kings was tainted by the heinous crimes; all of them leading into murder. These events, still rustling in the history, are about to be opened. Set as a chronicle of the historical crimes, _Rakkt_ (qv) narrates and analyses the most infamous true stories of historical assassinations, which changed the course of modern India. The bone chilling tales of deceit and betrayal are brought to light from the exotic ruins of the real locations.
